/usr/bin/c++   -g -DCHECK_PTHREAD_RETURN_VALUE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Wsign-compare -Wunused-variable -Wno-unused-parameter -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wwrite-strings -march=native -std=c++11 -lrt -rdynamic -pthread -ljson -lssl -lcrypto -lboost_system -lboost_program_options -O2 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/bpforward.dir/main.cpp.o  -o bpforward  -L/usr/local/boost/lib -lboost_system -lboost_log_setup -lboost_log -lboost_thread -lboost_filesystem -Wl,-Bstatic -ljson -lcrypto -Wl,-Bdynamic -lboost_program_options -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/boost/lib
